mapper.select: select u.userid,u.profilepicture,f.followCount,f2.followerCount from tb_user u, (select count(follow) as followCount from userfollow where userid = #{userid}) f, (select count(follower) as followerCount from userfollower where userid = #{userid}) f2 where userid =#{userid}

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,b.thumbnail,SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(b.contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''),1,25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt from ( select distinct bidx,HITCOUNT,thumbnail,contents,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,CATEGORY from board ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx where userid=#{userid} order by b.writedate desc
select b.title,r.CONTENTS,r.USERID from board b,boardreply r where b.bidx = r.bidx and r.userid= #{userid} order by b.writedate desc

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(b.contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''),1,25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt,scrapedate from ( select distinct b.bidx,b.HITCOUNT,b.contents,b.TITLE,b.USERID,b.WRITEDATE,b.CATEGORY,s.scrapedate from board b,scrape s where b.bidx=s.bidx and s.userid=#{userid} ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx order by b.writedate desc
